short_summary: The Canadian Space Agency is requesting services of a consultant to provide independent support, oversight of the GATEWAY Canadarm 3 projects GERI and the Gateway External Robotics System (GERS), Safety and Reliability functions.
description: The Consultant will support the Office of Safety and Mission Assurance (OSMA) to develop plans and processes required to implement a Safety Review Panel (CSRP) which will be used on the Canadarm 3 projects and other projects at CSA.

# Tender Announcement
## Part of the Gateway Canadarm 3 Projects
### Canadian Space Agency (ASC)

#### **Reference #**: 9F037-20230091
#### **Amendment #**: 3
#### **Publication Date**: January 24, 2024
#### **Closing Date**: February 23, 2024, 14:00:00

The **Canadian Space Agency (ASC)** is inviting proposals for independent services to support the Gateway Canadarm 3 projects. Specifically, the successful consultant will provide:

* Oversight of Safety and Reliability functions for the GERI and GERS systems.
* Support to develop Safety Review Panel (CSRP) plans and processes.

The services are required to ensure compliance with ASC's safety and reliability standards for projects including the Canadarm 3.

**Key Requirements:**

* Professional engineering services
* Quality assurance services
* Project monitoring and evaluation

**Location:**

* The services will be delivered in Longueuil, Quebec, Canada.

**Selection Criteria:**

* Highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements:**

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Contact:**

* Valérie Geoffroy
* Email: [valerie.geoffroy@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.geoffroy@asc-csa.gc.ca)
* Phone: (438) 364-2385

**Bid Documents:**

* Available on the Canadabuys website [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

The deadline for bid submission is February 23, 2024. Please ensure your proposal is in accordance with the requirements and guidelines outlined in the bid documents. Only submissions that meet the selection criteria will be considered for this tender. Please direct any questions or concerns to the contact person listed above.
